bike.description: C-4 carbon w/ Integrated head tube w/1 1/2" lower, Oversized 34.9mm round seat tube Oversized PIIS BB-86 shell, Double water bottle mounts.
sizes: XS (44cm), S (47cm), M (50cm), L (53cm), XL (55cm), XXL (58cm)
